movies.name: Game Night
movies.sinopsis: A group of friends who meet regularly for game nights find themselves entangled in a real-life mystery when the shady brother of one of them is seemingly kidnapped by dangerous gangsters.

movies.name: Area X: Annihilation
movies.sinopsis: A biologist signs up for a dangerous, secret expedition into a mysterious zone where the laws of nature don't apply.

movies.name: Hannah
movies.sinopsis: Intimate portrait of a woman drifting between reality and denial when she is left alone to grapple with the consequences of her husband's imprisonment.

movies.name: The Lodgers
movies.sinopsis: A family curse confines orphaned twins Rachel and Edwards to their home, in punishment for their ancestors' sins. Bound to the rules of a haunting childhood lullaby, the twins must never let any outsiders inside the house.

movies.name: Beast of Burden
movies.sinopsis: Sean Haggerty only has an hour to deliver his illegal cargo. An hour to reassure a drug cartel, a hitman, and the DEA that nothing is wrong. An hour to make sure his wife survives. And he must do it all from the cockpit of his Cessna.

movies.name: The Chamber
movies.sinopsis: A young man fresh out of law school tries to win a reprieve for his racist grandfather who is on death row.

movies.name: Survivors Guide to Prison
movies.sinopsis: Today, you're more likely to go to prison in the United States than anywhere else in the world. So in the unfortunate case it should happen to you - this is the Survivors Guide to Prison.

movies.name: Red Sparrow
movies.sinopsis: Ballerina Dominika Egorova is recruited to 'Sparrow School', a Russian intelligence service where she is forced to use her body as a weapon. Her first mission, targeting a C.I.A. agent, threatens to unravel the security of both nations.
